visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a bar chart with the following specifications: Chart type: bar, Chart title: 'Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be the names of professions, Y-axis labels should be percentages formatted as '{value} %', Custom colors: ['#C0C0C0', '#0C090A'], Data series: Two series, 'Men' and 'Women', with corresponding data values, Additional configurations: Stacked bars in percentage format, tooltip with shared and sticky options, and a subtitle linking to the source data.

title.text: Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a bar chart to display the gender distribution in the top 10 professions in Sweden for individuals aged 16-64 in 2017. The chart is titled 'Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017' and includes a subtitle linking to the source data. The X-axis lists the professions, and the Y-axis shows the percentage of gender distribution. The chart uses custom colors '#C0C0C0' and '#0C090A' for the series. The data series include 'Men' and 'Women' with their respective percentages. The bars are stacked in percentage format, and the tooltip is configured to be shared and sticky with a specific background color. Additional accessibility features are included for better usability.
